action_title: (CFT) Insectivorous birds and bats: Plant/maintain ground cover amongst perrenial crops (16b, 16c)
key_messages:
Key Messages:
Birds (1 study): One site comparison from Spain found more insectivorous birds and higher bird diversity in a vineyard with resident vegetation (without tillage), compared to a vineyard with bare soil (with conventional tillage), between the vine rows.
